TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AuthenticablePrincipal extends System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal

summary.span: 封装可以对其进行身份验证的主体所通用的帐户和联系人数据。

span.span: Encapsulates the account and contact data common to principals that can be authenticated.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 此构造函数由派生类构造函数调用以初始化基类，不适合直接在代码中使用。

span.span: This constructor is called by derived-class constructors to initialize the base class and is not intended for use directly from your code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从此类派生的自定义扩展类可以从派生类构造函数中调用此构造函数以初始化基类。Custom extension classes that derive from this class can call this constructor from the derived class constructor to initialize the base class. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[主体扩展](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49d1b257-d652-4224-bdae-2edabced8f00)概述主题。For more information, see the [Principal Extensions](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49d1b257-d652-4224-bdae-2edabced8f00) overview topic.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个可以为 null 的 ，用于指定帐户过期的日期和时间。

span.span: Gets or sets a Nullable that specifies the date and time that the account expires.

value.span: 一个 ，用于指定帐户过期的日期和时间；如果帐户永远不过期，则为 null。

span.span: A that specifies the date and time that the account expires, or null if the account never expires.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与中 的所有属性一样, 返回的时间采用 UTC 格式。As with all properties in , the time returned is in UTC form. 若要将其转换为本地时间, 请在返回对象上调用方法。To convert it to local time, call the method on the return object. 设置时, 时间将默认为 UTC。When you set the , the time will default to UTC. 如果要以本地时间编写, 请将 对象的属性指定为。If you want to write in local time, then specify the property of your object as .

exception.span: 基础存储不支持此属性。

span.span: The underlying store does not support this property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AccountLockoutTime As Nullable(Of DateTime)
public: property Nullable<DateTime> AccountLockoutTime { Nullable<DateTime> get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个可以为 null 的 ，用于指定帐户被锁定的日期和时间。

span.span: Gets the Nullable that specifies the date and time that the account was locked out.

value.span: 一个 ，用于指定帐户被锁定的日期和时间；如果帐户上未设置锁定时间，则为 null。

span.span: A that specifies the date and time that the account was locked out, or null if no lockout time is set on the account.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 帐户锁定时间依赖于系统, 不能由帐户管理 API 设置。The account lockout time is system dependent, and cannot be set by the Account Management API. 若要解除帐户锁定, 请使用方法。To unlock the account, use the method. 当返回非 null 值时, 可能无法锁定帐户。It is possible that an account may not be locked out when the returns a non-null value. 应用程序应使用方法来确定帐户是否已锁定。Applications should use the method to determine whether the account is locked out. 与中 的所有属性一样, 返回的时间采用 UTC 格式。As with all properties in , the time returned is in UTC form. 若要将其转换为本地时间, 请在返回对象上调用方法。To convert it to local time, call the method on the return object.

exception.span: 基础存储不支持此属性。

span.span: The underlying store does not support this property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property Enabled As Nullable(Of Boolean)
public: property Nullable<bool> Enabled { Nullable<bool> get(); void set(Nullable<bool> value); };
member this.Enabled : Nullable<bool> with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个可以为 null 的布尔值，该值指定是否支持此帐户进行身份验证。

span.span: Gets or sets a Nullable Boolean value that specifies whether this account is enabled for authentication.

value.span: 如果启用主体，则为 （如果未保持该帐户，则为 null）；否则为 。

span.span: if the principal is enabled, or null if the account has not been persisted; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果主体尚未保存在存储区中, 则此属性返回 null。If the principal has not been persisted in the store, this property returns null. 保留主体后, 默认的启用设置取决于存储区。After the principal is persisted, the default enabled setting depends on the store. AD DS 和 AD LDS 存储区会在保留新主体时禁用它们, 而 SAM 会在保留时启用新的主体。The AD DS and AD LDS stores disable new principals when they are persisted, whereas SAM enables new principals when they are persisted. 应用程序只能在保存后将此属性设置为值。The application can only set this property to a value after it has been persisted in the store.

exception.span: 基础存储不支持此属性。

span.span: The underlying store does not support this property.

exception.span: 应用程序尝试为此属性设置 Null 值。

span.span: The application tried to set a null value for this property.

summary.span: 使此帐户的密码过期。

span.span: Expires the password for this account.

summary.span: 这会强制用户在下次登录时更改其密码。

span.span: This will force the user to change his/her password at the next logon.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法可强制用户在下次登录时更改密码。Call this method to force the user to change the password at the next logon.

exception.span: 将更改保存到存储区时发生异常。

span.span: An exception occurred when saving the changes to the store.
